description:
Avoiding chills is crucial when travelling in the cold. This double layered base layer top holds in youngster's body heat and moves any sweat to the outside layer where it can evaporate without cooling them down.

  • Polyester and merino blend has Accu-Dri® wicking technology to keep you dry and warm
  • Merino wool is naturally antimicrobial
  • Raglan sleeves allow unrestricted movement
  • Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear
name: Kombi Merino Mix Pro Crew Top - Children to Youths
